Package cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.services

package cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.services
Service Components are the class file which contains @Service annotation. These class files are used to write business logic in a different layer, separated from @RestController class file. These classes implement the Interface with @Service annotation. Service Implementation are the class files which implement the methods from the Service Components and the corresponding repository. These classes use the keyword implements to implement the abstract methods from the Service Component
  • Related Packages

    cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.models
    Models Component are the class files which contain the @Entity annotation representing data that can be persisted to the database.
    cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.repository
    Repository Component are the class files which contain the @Repository annotation these repositories have interfaces that extend Spring Data JPA JpaRepository to interact with PostgreSQL Database.
    cs2810.group30.oaxacabackend.security
    The security package contains Spring security configurations and security objects of which are implemented in the Service package.
